official_title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim May 1, 1980, "National Bicycling Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate May 1, 1980, as "National Bicycling Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim May 1, 1980, "National Bicycling Day".
